main.name: Noor Mir
main.description: I like engaging in various parts of frontend/backend development and like to learn about new technologies
main.bio: My name is Noor and I'm a Full Stack Web Developer. I recently graduated from the University of Miami's Web Development program. I am currently getting involved in learning Java so that I can expand my knowledge in programming.  I always believed that in order to become successful in life, one must practice what they love consistently.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details and job oppurtunites. Looking forward to meeting with you.

resume.skillmessage: These are the libraries and frameworks I have been familiar with in Javascript.

education.description: Gaining Knowledge and creating projects in full-stack javascript

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in International Relations and Global Studies.

work.title: Information Technology Intern (ITS)
work.description: Provide Service Desk coverage during business hours for customers reporting incidents or seeking assistance in using the standard systems & applications. Provide high level technical support and coordination to cater for speedy resolution of complex incidents related to computer performance, connectivity, applications access and other IT services. Maintain the IT infrastructure and services in the Amman regional office and the rest of the AME cluster offices. Focus on maintaining user computers, printers, cell phones, with a professional attitude and service. First level software and hardware support through online guidance and second level support for problems demanding on-site troubleshooting and solution delivery
